Tuition

The tuition table for Catholic University Cardinal Raul Silva Henriquez gives an overview of costs but prices are approximate and subject to change and don't include accommodation, textbooks, or living expenses. The costs of programs might differ significantly for local and international students. The only source of truth for current numbers is the university's official website.
